thig13.2:1.1: Samaṇā’ti bhoti supi → bhoti tvaṁ sayasi (bj); bhoti maṁ vipassi (sya1ed,
thig13.2:1.2: pabujjhasi → paṭibujjhasi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed)
thig13.2:1.3: Samaṇāneva → samaṇānameva (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed)
thig13.2:2.2: paveccasi → payacchasi (bj); pavecchasi (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed)
thig13.2:8.3: sukkāna dhammānaṁ → sukkehi dhammehi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed)
thig13.2:22.1: Rohinī → rohiṇī (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed)
